channel.title: Semantic Segmentation on memo
channel.description: Recent content in Semantic Segmentation on memo

item.title: Deformable Convolutional Networks
item.description: J. Dai et al. “Deformable Convolutional Networks” (2017) ICCV2017 概要 作用するpixel座標が固定だったConvolutionやROI poolingを拡張し、入力に応じて作用するpixel

item.title: Pyramid Scene Parsing Network (PSPNet)
item.description: H. Zhao, et al. “Pyramid Scene Parsing Network” (2016) 概要 Semantic Segmentationを行うFully Convolutional networkに、Pyramid Pooling Moduleを追加したPyramid Scene Parsing
